    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107458</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Newton's concept of refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzept des Newtons der Brechung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le concept de newton de la réfraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conceito do newton do refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Concetto del Newton di rifrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έννοια Newton της διάθλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concepto del neutonio de la refracción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The diagrams illustrate Newton's concept of the refraction of light as similar to a ball rolling down a ramp.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bending of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speeding up</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Diagramme veranschaulichen Konzept des 
Newtons der Brechung des Lichtes, wie ähnlich einem Kugelrollen 
hinunter eine Rampe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les diagrammes illustrent le concept de newton de
la réfraction de la lumière comme semblable à un roulement de boule
en bas d'une rampe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os diagramas ilustram o conceito do newton do 
refraction da luz como similar a um rolling da esfera abaixo uma 
rampa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli schemi illustrano il concetto del Newton 
della rifrazione di luce come simile ad un rolling della sfera giù un
dilagare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα διαγράμματα επεξηγούν την έννοια Newton της 
διάθλασης του φωτός όπως παρόμοιας με μια σφαίρα που κυλά κάτω 
μια κεκλιμένη ράμπα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los diagramas ilustran el concepto del neutonio 
de la refracción de la luz como similar a un balanceo de la bola 
abajo de una rampa.</string>
          </description>
